HeroSection.subtitle: Add value to your brand with quality, hygienic, practical, economical, and eco-friendly paper cup solutions. Our products are safe for food contact.
HeroSection.groupCompany: Trend Kağıtçılık Ürünleri is a group company of Doğu Karadeniz Toptan Gıda Pazarlama.
HeroSection.experience: With 42 years of marketing and over 10 years of production experience, we operate in our 16,000 m² modern indoor facility in Ankara with over 120 employees.
HeroSection.production: With our state-of-the-art machinery park, we offer high volume, quality, and competitive prices by prioritizing hygiene and quality rules.
HeroSection.brand: Under our EKSTREM CUP brand, we produce leak-proof paper cups in various sizes and weights, conforming to European standards, with unique and custom design options.

CtaSection.title: Ready to Make the Switch?
CtaSection.description: Join businesses and individuals choosing sustainable Ekstrem Packaging paper cups. Get a custom quote or learn more about our eco-friendly solutions today.

Footer.tagline: Quality, hygienic, and eco-friendly paper packaging solutions. We are here to add value to your brand.

AboutPage.pageDescription: Discover the story, mission, and values of Ekstrem Packaging. Learn about our experience in quality and eco-friendly paper packaging solutions.
